meanings.sent1: The horse was the balkiest animal in the stable, always stopping abruptly during rides.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the balkiest student in the class, often refusing to participate in group activities.
meanings.sent3: The balkiest cat in the neighborhood refused to come inside even during heavy rain.
meanings.sent4: His balkiest behavior at the party made it clear he didn't want to dance.
meanings.sent5: The balkiest door in the house always got stuck halfway open, causing frustration.

meanings.definition: Most difficult to manage or control
meanings.sent1: The balkiest car in the lot required constant repairs and maintenance.
meanings.sent2: Dealing with the balkiest customer proved to be a challenging task for the new employee.
meanings.sent3: Trying to train the balkiest puppy in the litter was like solving a tricky puzzle.
meanings.sent4: Her hair, always the balkiest in the morning, seemed to have a mind of its own.
meanings.sent5: The balkiest computer in the office crashed at the worst possible times, causing chaos.
